scripts.setVersion: jq '.version = "'${npm_package_version}'"' extension/manifest.json > manifest_tmp && mv manifest_tmp extension/manifest.json
scripts.setIdentifier: jq '.browser_specific_settings.gecko.id = "'filtrersport@${npm_package_version}'"' extension/manifest.json > manifest_tmp && mv manifest_tmp extension/manifest.json
scripts.prebuild: npm run setVersion && npm run setIdentifier
